zAutoUpdate.title: Auto Update
zAutoUpdate.description: Enable updates through the client by users. When disabled, the Check for Updates button is also hidden. Default: false

EnableSilentAutoUpdate.title: Enable Silent Auto Update
EnableSilentAutoUpdate.description: Allow the desktop client to silently check for updates and, if user’s version is lower than the stable version set by Zoom, install upon launching the client. This option requires the AutoUpdate option to be enabled(true). Default: true

AlwaysCheckLatestVersion.title: Always Check Latest Version
AlwaysCheckLatestVersion.description: Allow the desktop client to check for updates and, if user’s version is lower than the latest version released by Zoom, prompt the user to install the update. This option requires the AutoUpdate option to be enabled(true). Default: true

SetUpdatingChannel.title: Set Updating Channel
SetUpdatingChannel.description: Control the cadence of updates applied to the desktop client (version 5.6.8 or higher): Slow (false): fewer updates and better stability.  Fast (true): newest features and updates. Default: false

DisableDaemonInstall.title: Disable Daemon Install
DisableDaemonInstall.description: Controls the use of the daemon helper to install updates, which bypasses the need to enter admin credentials when upgrading. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled(true). Default: false

NoFacebook.title: No Facebook
NoFacebook.description: Remove Facebook login option. Default: false

NoGoogle.title: No Google
NoGoogle.description: Remove Google login option. Default: false

EnableAppleLogin.title: Enable Apple Login
EnableAppleLogin.description: Allow access to Apple login option. Default: true

NoSSO.title: Remove SSO Loginn
NoSSO.description: Remove SSO login option. Default: false

DisableLoginWithEmail.title: Disable Login With Email
DisableLoginWithEmail.description: Remove Email login option. Default: false

zAutoSSOLogin.title: Auto SSO login
zAutoSSOLogin.description: Defaults login to SSO. Default: false

zSSOHost.title: SSO Host
zSSOHost.description: Set the default SSO URL for SSO login. For example, hooli.zoom.us would be set as "zSSOHost=hooli"

ForceSSOURL.title: Force SSO URL
ForceSSOURL.description: Set and lock the default SSO URL for SSO login. For example, hooli.zoom.us would be set as "ForceSSOUrl=hooli"

EnableEmbedBrowserForSSO.title: Enable Embed Browser For SSO
EnableEmbedBrowserForSSO.description: Use embedded browser in the client for SSO. Default: false

SetWebDomain.title: Set Web Domain
SetWebDomain.description: Sets the web domain for logging in or joining a meeting. By default, the value is https://zoom.us or https://zoom.com.

DisableAutoLaunchSSO.title: Disable Auto Launch SSO
DisableAutoLaunchSSO.description: Prevent Zoom from automatically launching the previously used SSO URL. This is useful for users with multiple accounts, each having their own SSO URL. Default: false
